name: Talent Attach
overview:
At Talent Attach our focus is giving our new media campaigns away to non-profits who â€œdo goodâ€ and are not just â€œdo goodersâ€. We are providing our services to all others at fair market value and it helps support our core work. Who should you give something to today? Its not yours anyway : )

Talent Attach is an organic agency that is continually trying new ideas and creating campaigns for a wide cross section of companies and non-profits. Our team is accomplished in everything from video work to strategic marketing campaigns.

Talent Attach will take your brand or idea and deliver it to the group of people it is intended for. We do this through a simple process of auditing the overall campaign of the brand, web presence, social media and smart phone (iPhone/Android) properties. We update the ones that are lacking and create where there is none. We do all of this around the campaign and always towards the main focus of the brand.

So give us a call, write us a letter, send us an email or just stop on by. We are much more interested in getting to know you and doing life with you than just getting a campaign done. As a family we come up with ideas and as family we fulfill on our promises. Relationships are always where we define success and it is also great to see a brand become huge in the meantime.
